item.title: The History of Ainmer the Bixie
item.description:
WARNING: AINMER ALERT
It’s common knowledge that one of the secrets behind Enlightenment’s success is our use of Teamspeak as a raid tool. While it can be disruptive at times – for the majority of the time it’s effectiveness is, by far, a major asset, especially when one considers the times we simply did not “have the numbers” to pull an encounter off, but did so regardless.

item.title: Mission: Roley
item.description: In 2006, an Enlightenment kill-squad unit was sent to prison by a Militia court for a crime they didn't commit. These men and woman promptly escaped from a maximum-security Freeport prison to the Antonican underground. Today, still wanted by the Militia, they survive as soldiers of fortune. If you have a problem, if no one else can help, and if you can find them, maybe you can hire the A-Team.

item.title: Redfang = Deadfang
item.description: (There will be definitely more to come in the next day or so as my creative juices get flowing - but I wanted to get this update at least started to get our monks off my back. So.. for you monk team - here you go!)

item.title: We ain't scared of no ghosts!
item.description: The last few weeks have seemed such a whirlwind - so this morning I sat down and actually began to reflect on them. I'm sure those of you who visit our sight are well aware of where we've come from and how we've progressed over the last ten months or so. Never in all my dreams back then of where this guild would go did I expect to be where I was last night - on the cutting edge of content. And what fun it is.

item.title: Tower of Sullon Zek!
item.description:
That's right, folks. Look what we did!
This update is short and sweet on the worlds and displays a few pictures of this zone we've stumbled across. Huge, huge kudo's to my guildmates for all their work figuring out and deciphering clues. What a great accomplishment guys!
